entry.title: ianw/bottomupcs
entry.summary:
Bottom Up Computer Science

Computer Science from the Bottom Up

You should be able to make the course materials by typing

make <html|pdf|epub>

Output is in html.output

Dependencies are roughly:

  • java
  • libxml2-utils
  • transfig (for fig2dev)
  • pdf : prince - https://www.princexml.com/
  • epub : calibre

I am always interested in contribution and feedback so please feel free to email

Ian Wienand ian@wienand.org
